content.query:
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_file_formats WHERE name = 'SynapseParquetFormat') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT [SynapseParquetFormat] 
	WITH ( FORMAT_TYPE = PARQUET)
GO

IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_data_sources WHERE name = 'synapse_adldemost_dfs_core_windows_net') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE [synapse_adldemost_dfs_core_windows_net] 
	WITH (
		LOCATION = 'abfss://synapse@adldemost.dfs.core.windows.net' 
	)
GO

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE products (
	[ProductID] int,
	[Name] nvarchar(4000),
	[ProductNumber] nvarchar(4000),
	[MakeFlag] int,
	[FinishedGoodsFlag] int,
	[Color] nvarchar(4000),
	[SafetyStockLevel] int,
	[ReorderPoint] int,
	[StandardCost] real,
	[ListPrice] real,
	[Size] nvarchar(4000),
	[SizeUnitMeasureCode] nvarchar(4000),
	[WeightUnitMeasureCode] nvarchar(4000),
	[Weight] numeric(10,0),
	[DaysToManufacture] int,
	[ProductLine] nvarchar(4000),
	[Class] nvarchar(4000),
	[Style] nvarchar(4000),
	[ProductModelID] int,
	[SellStartDate] datetime2(7),
	[SellEndDate] datetime2(7),
	[DiscontinuedDate] datetime2(7),
	[ProductCategory] nvarchar(4000),
	[ProductSubcategory] nvarchar(4000),
	[id_sk_product] bigint
	)
	WITH (
	LOCATION = 'application/sales/products.parquet',
	DATA_SOURCE = [synapse_adldemost_dfs_core_windows_net],
	FILE_FORMAT = [SynapseParquetFormat]
	)
GO


SELECT TOP 100 * FROM dbo.products
GO
